languages.text: "Мечтать о пире во время чумы... Как это на вас похоже, госпожа Хейдари".
"Dreaming of feasting in a time of plague... True to form as ever, Mistress Heydari."
languages.original_text: "Мечтать о пире во время чумы... Как это на вас похоже, госпожа Хейдари".

traits.locale_text: "Dreaming of feasting in a time of plague... True to form as ever, Mistress Heydari."

languages.text: “在瘟疫爆发的时候想着大吃大喝……你真是一点都没变过啊，海达利女士。”
languages.original_text: "Dreaming of feasting in a time of plague... True to form as ever, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: “在瘟疫爆发的时候想着大吃大喝……你真是一点都没变过啊，海达利女士。”

languages.text: «Soñar con festines en tiempos de plaga... Veo que sigue en su línea, señora Heydari».
languages.original_text: "Dreaming of feasting in a time of plague... True to form as ever, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: «Soñar con festines en tiempos de plaga... Veo que sigue en su línea, señora Heydari».

languages.text: 「疫病の時代にあって饗宴を夢見るか…いつになっても変わらんな、ヘイダリ女史」
languages.original_text: "Dreaming of feasting in a time of plague... True to form as ever, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: 「疫病の時代にあって饗宴を夢見るか…いつになっても変わらんな、ヘイダリ女史」

languages.text: "Ihr träumt von einem Besäufnis zu Seuchenzeiten ... Ihr bleibt Euch einfach treu, Herrin Heydari."
languages.original_text: "Dreaming of feasting in a time of plague... True to form as ever, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr träumt von einem Besäufnis zu Seuchenzeiten ... Ihr bleibt Euch einfach treu, Herrin Heydari."

languages.text: « Penser à festoyer alors que la tragédie menace... Toujours fidèle à vous-même, maîtresse Heydari. »
languages.original_text: "Dreaming of feasting in a time of plague... True to form as ever, Mistress Heydari."

traits.locale_text: « Penser à festoyer alors que la tragédie menace... Toujours fidèle à vous-même, maîtresse Heydari. »

languages.text: "Veba zamanı bile boğazının derdindesin. Hiç şaşırtmıyorsun Üstat Heydari."
languages.original_text: "Dreaming of feasting in a time of plague... True to form as ever, Mistress Heydari."
